thread.title: Living wage increases to hit big four bottom line, warns Moody’s
thread.title_full: Living wage increases to hit big four bottom line, warns Moody’s

title: Living wage increases to hit big four bottom line, warns Moody’s
text:
31 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
George Osbourne’s hike of the minimum wage will hit food retailers the hardest with the Big Four UK grocers’ profits coming under particular pressure, according to a new report by Moody’s. Available to members only
